metadata.name: SQL & Engines
metadata.description: The SQL language and several major SQL engines / implementations

entries.basedOn: Declarative language for relational databases; various engines implement subsets/extensions
Open-source relational DB with strong standards compliance and extensibility
Widely-deployed open-source relational DB, common in web stacks
Embedded, serverless SQL engine used in apps and lightweight storage
Commercial enterprise RDBMS with T-SQL extensions
